headline: BMO Lifts Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) Target After Q4, Says EPS Still Needs to Catch Up
summary: Archer-Daniels-Midland Company (NYSE:ADM) is included among the 13 Cheapest Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in. On February 4, BMO Capital’s Andrew Strelzik lifted his price recommendation on Archer-Daniels-Midland Company (NYSE:ADM) to $63 from $57 following the company’s fourth-quarter results. He kept a Market Perform rating on the shares. The higher target reflects updated assumptions tied to […]
